name: Christine's Path
description:
This game was made during Game Devcember 2021 within 1 month.

Theme: Recovery

Content: You are playing Christine. She wonders through the castle, trying to cope with the past happenings (the war of the witches) and in hope for a better future. You will decide if this hope comes true.

Controls: 

Movement: A & D Key or left and right Arrow Key

Interact: E Key

Attack: F Key

Jump: Space

The sound effects used in the game: rain, door, foot steps, interact, hit, monster attack and monster sound.

Music: "Going Different Ways" by Eric Matyas www.soundimage.org

Fonts: Pixellari and Alagard
